item.description:
Bring your favorite games and join us for some fun this Tuesday. Jaho Cafe is a smaller location so it shouldn't be too difficult to find us. We may need to move to another establishment if Jaho Cafe is too crowded. Please be sure to observe parking restrictions on side streets off of Derby Street. Most side street parking is by permit only. There is a parking garage not too far from this cafe.

This event will be an open game night (Strategy, Word, Card, Dice and/or Party games). We will leave it up to group choice on what we play that night. If necessary, we will divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preferences.

As per the usual policy, we ask everyone to please purchase something from the cafe so we may continue to support the businesses which provide us with public meeting locations.  

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group with games on the table.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Open Game Night in Salem
